00014     void TriggerResult::Print(Option_t *option) const {
00015 
00016         std::cout << "TriggerResult { " << "name: " << name_ << ", " << "pass: " << pass_ << " }" << std::endl;
00017 
00018         for (int i = 0; i < variables_.GetSize(); ++i) {
00019             std::cout << "Element " << i << " : " << variables_[i] << std::endl;
00020         }
00021     }
00022 
00023     void TriggerResult::Clear(Option_t*) {
00024 
00025         TObject::Clear();
00026 
00027         name_ = "";
00028         pass_ = false;
00029 
00030         for (int i = 0; i < variables_.GetSize(); ++i) {
00031             variables_[i] = 0;
00032         }
00033     }
00034 
00035     void TriggerResult::Copy(TObject& ob) const {
00036 
00037         TriggerResult& tr = (TriggerResult&) (ob);
00038         tr.name_ = name_;
00039         tr.pass_ = pass_;
00040         tr.variables_ = variables_;
00041     }
00042 
00043     void TriggerResult::set(const TString& name, bool pass, int nvar) {
00044 
00045         name_ = name;
00046         pass_ = pass;
00047 
00048         if (nvar > variables_.GetSize()) {
00049             variables_.Set(nvar);
00050         }
00051     }
00052 
00053     void TriggerResult::setAlgoVar(int element, double value) {
00054         if (element >= 0 && element < variables_.GetSize()) {
00055             variables_[element] = value;
00056         }
00057     }
